content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://accessurl.com https://www.accessurl.com http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 http://localhost:4000 https://localhost:4000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src https://accessurl.com https://wwww.accessurl.com http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 http://localhost:4000 https://localhost:4000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
description: Share access to websites without giving away your username and password. Share access with an Access URL instead.
name: AccessURL
